page.title: 02Survey Results-Tamar Valley
page.content: Of 261 people intervewed in our area 27% have lived here all their lives and 43% for less than 10 years. Most came from within a 100 kilometre radius and 5 came from abroad. They came to live here for work, to retire, for the beautiful countryside or to be near relatives. Occupations range from farming to electronics engineering. Many are Naval personnel. 31.5% work in the area, 42.5% in Plymouth and 26% elsewhere. The main shopping town seems to be Tavistock and others shop locally and in Plymouth, Callington or Launceston. Hobbies range from quiet activities like gardening to sport and Do-It-Yourself jobs around the house. When interviewing the public we found that half of those we called on were out, probably at work, and 14.3% were unemployed.
